channel.title: Infuse Release Notes (ios)
channel.description: Infuse Release Notes (ios) - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: 8.1.2 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • AI video upscaling
  • Support for SMB 3.1.1
    • Improved
  • Improved upscaling for high-framerate (50+ fps) videos
    • Fixed
  • Fixed Plex metadata updates via server notifications
  • Fixed sorting by date for 123 Cloud Drive
  • Fixed missing ‘Show Logos’ option
  • Fixed missing playlist name in context menus
  • Fixed visual artifacts when downloading unwatched items
  • Fixed removal of Plex items after deletion
  • Fixed animation for item deletion
  • Fixed sorting with ‘The’ article
  • Fixed crash when opening Add Files menu
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 8.1.1 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Added movie and TV show logos for Plex
    • Improved
  • Improved collection of diagnostics and crash logs
    • Fixed
  • Fixed local folder artwork presentation
  • Fixed missing blurred episode thumbnails in some cases
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 8.1 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Added alphabet scrollbar while browsing
  • Added 123 Cloud Drive streaming
  • Added support for .STRM files
  • Added Dolby Vision metatags from Emby and Jellyfin
    • Improved
  • Improved support for Dolby Vision (Profile 8) videos
  • Improved playback progress syncing with Emby and Jellyfin
  • Revamped internal file browsing infrastructure
  • Various UI improvements
    • Fixed
  • Fixed issue where TV episode air date was not visible
  • Fixed various crashes during playback
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 8.0.9 (iOS)
item.description:
Improved
  • Improved handling of active stream limits on some servers
    • Fixed
  • Fixed crashes during playback
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 8.0.8 (iOS)
item.description:
Improved
  • Improved video loading speed
    • Fixed
  • Fixed playback when using HTTP redirects in some cases
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 8.0.7 (iOS)
item.description:
Fixed
  • Fixed playback when using HTTP redirects
  • Fixed Watched/Unwatched buttons in list view
  • Fixed minor UI issues with progress bar during playback
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 8.0.6 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Added haptic feedback for quick 2x playback speed control
    • Improved
  • Optimized playback pipeline for faster start times
  • Under-the-hood improvements for Home Screen
    • Fixed
  • Fixed UI issues with brightness indicator
  • Fixed reloading series backdrops in Up Next in some cases
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 8.0.5 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Added tap/hold gesture to enable temporary 2x playback speed
    • Improved
  • Improved contrast of cache bar colors
  • Improved touch area for buttons during playback
    • Fixed
  • Fixed appearance of volume controls
  • Fixed behavior related to orientation lock
  • Fixed thumbnail presentation of unfetched posters
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 8.0.4 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Skip Intro, Preview, and Credits for Jellyfin 10.10+
  • Added new Library indexing and scanning options
  • Added ‘Limited’ streaming cache option to allow for lower initial bandwidth usage
    • Improved
  • Improvements for Jellyfin 10.10
  • Increased font sizes on Home, Library, and details pages
  • Updated Trakt logo
    • Fixed
  • Fixed missing audio for some Dolby Atmos files
  • Other minor improvements and fixes

item.title: 8.0.3 (iOS)
item.description:
Improved
  • Streaming cache improvements
  • Improved reliability when indexing some WebDAV shares
  • Improved thumbnail sizes for home and details pages
    • Fixed
  • Fixed issue with player closing when adjusting playback settings
  • Fixed refreshing Home when media share connections are restored
  • Other minor improvements and fixes

item.title: 8.0.2 (iOS)
item.description:
Improved
  • Improved indexing reliability of some WebDAV shares
  • Improved limits for streaming disk cache
    • Fixed
  • Fixed updating of Home Screen items
  • Fixed issues with dark/light appearance switching
  • Other minor improvements and fixes

item.title: 8.0.1 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Added Voice Over support to Home
    • Improved
  • Improved visibility of volume control
    • Fixed
  • Fixed some cases of blurry posters on Home
  • Fixed an error when opening Plex Watchlist
  • Fixed some reports of crashing
  • Fixed duplicate genres for Emby/Jellyfin episodes
  • Fixed logo position in certain cases
  • Fixed button highlighting on tap
  • Other minor improvements and fixes

item.title: 8.0 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Refreshed layout and designs
  • All-new modern infrastructure
  • Redesigned player controls
  • Added quick access to playback speed and volume boost
    • Improved
  • Optimizations for iOS 18 and iPhone 16 screens
  • Many other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.8.4 (iOS)
item.description:
Fixed
  • Fixed issues with subtitles on iOS 18
  • Fixed issue with entering MAC addresses
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.8.3 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Optimized for iOS 18
    • Fixed
  • Fixed issue where subtitles would appear with missing characters
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.8.2 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Added Slovenian translation
    • Improved
  • Improvements for SMB streaming
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.8.1 (iOS)
item.description:
Fixed
  • Fixed issues with artwork fetching on iOS 18
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.8 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Support for multiple video versions from Emby and Jellyfin
  • Automatic version selection for Emby, Jellyfin, and Plex
    • Improved
  • Minor visual improvements for sorting menus
    • Fixed
  • Fixed InfuseSync installation and settings issues
  • Fixed issues where InfuseSync may be required in Direct Mode
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.7.7 (iOS)
item.description:
Fixed
  • Fixed issue with displaying TV seasons
  • Fixes for Emby sorting
  • Fixed volume level overlay unexpectedly appearing when adaptive volume is active
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.7.6 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • New sort options for Emby & Jellyfin
  • Support for Jellyfin 10.9
    • Improved
  • Improved error message when opening unavailable items
  • Improvements for upcoming Google Drive account permission changes
    • Fixed
  • Resolved issues with adding new MEGA & OneDrive connections
  • Removed redundant network requests when entering a folder for the first time
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.7.5 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • New sort options for Plex
  • Option to disable ‘Smart Folders’ for faster browsing
    • Improved
  • Improved handling of Plex collections
  • Updated Watching/Watchlist icon
    • Fixed
  • Fixed incorrect sort order for Plex collections
  • Fixed reloading cast/crew images when scrolling
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.7.4 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Browse Plex collections in Direct Mode
  • Direct search for cast/crew in Emby/Jellyfin
  • Add/remove items from Plex Watchlist
  • Hide Library tab when using Direct Mode only
    • Fixed
  • Resolved issues with listing some Plex Watchlist items
  • Resolved issue with file sort order when using Jellyfin
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.7.3 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Dolby Atmos spatial audio
  • Direct search for cast/crew in Plex
  • Display ‘Dolby Atmos’ tags for compatible audio tracks
  • Added 3s custom seek time option
  • Display more items in Emby lists
  • Custom seek times now apply to gestures
    • Improved
  • Playback core improvements
  • Optimized caching of cast/crew thumbnails
    • Fixed
  • Resolved playback issues when seeking some videos
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.7.2 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Expanded support for Dolby Vision (Profile 8)
  • Skip intro for Emby
  • Access Plex Watchlist from Home Screen
  • AV1 hardware decoding (A17/M3 devices)
  • Search cast/crew from video details page
  • Option to quickly add/remove items from Watching list
  • Access longer Home Screen lists in Direct Mode
    • Improved
  • Improved efficiency of metadata fetching
  • Improved descriptions of some codecs (VP9, AV1, Opus)
    • Fixed
  • Fixed episode selection when opening seasons via Up Next list
  • Fixed issue where videos would play with a black screen
  • Fixed unnecessary metadata refetching for some TV shows
  • Fixed UI freezing issue when pasting Emby URLs
  • Fixed access to individual series set as Favorites
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.7.1 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Search collections in Emby, Jellyfin, and Plex
    • Improved
  • Improvements for SMB streaming
  • Improved library scanning speed for cloud services
  • Improved flow when adding media server connections
    • Fixed
  • Fixed watched status updates for Emby
  • Fixed missing text when switching between light/dark modes
  • Fixed episode numbers in playlists
  • Fixed incorrect sort order on Home for pinned lists
  • Fixed ‘Show Poster Titles’ option when browsing
  • Fixed behavior of ‘Skip Credits’ button in some cases
  • Fixed minor UI issue after refreshing while browsing
  • Fixed rare issue with lost focus position after playback
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.7 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Direct Mode for Emby, Jellyfin, and Plex
  • Support Plex skip features (intros, credits, commercials)
    • Improved
  • Improved speed and reliability of Trakt sync
    • Fixed
  • Fixed issues with meta ID tags in NFO files when manually searching for TMDB matches
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.6.7 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Set custom forward/back seek times
  • Recognize movie ID tags in NFO files for improved matching accuracy
    • Improved
  • Improved reliability of Trakt playback history sync
  • Improved initial scroll position when opening video details page
    • Fixed
  • Fixed issue with incorrect release dates for Plex items
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.6.6 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Recognize movie ID tags in filenames for improved matching accuracy
    • Fixed
  • Fixed delays in Trakt sync
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.6.5 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • VoiceOver rotor actions
  • Linked Spotlight search results to details page
  • Support 3rd party email clients when submitting diagnostics
  • Added Spanish (Latin America) translation
    • Improved
  • Improved transfer speeds when submitting diagnostics
    • Fixed
  • Fix for a crash with broken season items in Up Next
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.6.4 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Added info message when deleting local files
    • Fixed
  • Fixed missing/empty local folders
  • Added missing VoiceOver strings
  • Fixes for incorrect episodes being played
  • Fixed issues with deleted items not being removed from lists
  • Fixed issues with PIN code app lock
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.6.3 (iOS)
item.description:
Fixed
  • Fixed user & password copy/paste on iOS 17
  • Fixed missing Emby TV shows in Up Next
  • Fixed sorting when using ‘Sort Title’
  • Fixed incorrect episode selection
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.6.2 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • New APIs for 3rd-party apps to play, bookmark, and save videos
  • Added ‘Sort Title’ tag support in NFO files
  • Add direct URLs in bulk using .links files
  • Support ‘clearlogo.png’ for local logo artwork overrides
    • Improved
  • Optimized for iOS 17
  • Improved reliability of network connections
  • Improved set up process for new shares
  • Improved priority of secure (HTTPS) connections
    • Fixed
  • Fixed issues with empty ‘Plot’ fields when using NFO files
  • Fixed an issue with cast/crew tags in NFO files
  • Fixed missing device name when using Wi-Fi upload
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.6.1 (iOS)
item.description:
Improved
  • Improved handling of complex subtitles
  • Improved reliability of fetching metadata and trailers
    • Fixed
  • Fixed appearance of season names after editing metadata on pre-playback
  • Fixed custom collections in miniseries
  • Fixed crashes caused by broken direct URLs
  • Fixed incorrect episode order after reloading metadata on pre-playback
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.6 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Stream from Aliyun Drive
  • Added Traditional Chinese (HK) translation
  • Added Hindi translation
    • Improved
  • Improved categorization of miniseries
  • Improved support for HAProxy (and similar services)
  • Improved handling of long series titles in season picker
  • Minor improvements for genre fetching
    • Fixed
  • Fixed black screen for certain HEVC videos
  • Fixed audio sync for certain files
  • Fixed minor issues with merged genres
  • Fixed filtering of iTunes videos
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.5.9 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • New Library section for Miniseries
  • Display custom TV season names from TMDB
    • Improved
  • Improved presentation of miniseries episodes on details page
    • Fixed
  • Fixed issues with media server watched status syncing
  • Fixed watch statuses for TV shows when browsing a share directly
  • Fixed genres for TV shows on Emby
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.5.8 (iOS)
item.description:
Improved
  • Improved handling of genres from Emby, Jellyfin, and Plex
  • Improved indexing of TV shows when metadata in the chosen dialect is not available
  • Improved purchase sharing via Trakt
  • Improved metrics for background refresh
    • Fixed
  • Fixed indexing issues when using Shoko with Jellyfin
  • Fixed a crash when playing HEVC videos on iOS 15 and earlier
  • Fixed volume boost for DTS tracks with embedded downmix parameters
  • Fixed volume boost for audio tracks without an explicit channel layout
  • Fixed a crash for filenames which contain specific characters and diacritics
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.5.7 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Default volume boost option
  • Option to include LFE channel in stereo downmix
  • Option for original or normalized volume on downmix
  • Added padding for subtitles with top position tags
    • Improved
  • Improved audio quality when downmixing
  • Improved playback of h.264 videos with invalid timestamps
  • Improved connection reliability for Jellyfin
  • Improved handling of YUV422P10LE and YUV444P10LE videos
  • Improved background task schedules
    • Fixed
  • Fixed issues with audio clipping on downmix
  • Fixed crackling audio when using spatial audio
  • Fixed buzzing audio when seeking certain videos
  • Fixed issues when resuming current episode via context menu
  • Fixed iCloud sync for cast and crew
  • Fixed crash on some videos when using volume boost
  • Fixed connection issues for Emby 4.8
  • Fixes for fetching metadata updates
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.5.6 (iOS)
item.description:
Fixed
  • Fixed OpenSubtitles downloads for some languages
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.5.5 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • New OpenSubtitles integration
  • Re-added support for mixed language file names
  • Switched to using merged TV show genres from TMDB
    • Improved
  • Improved color accuracy for Hi10p files
    • Fixed
  • Fixes for deleting local files
  • Fixed freezes when opening TV shows
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.5.4 (iOS)
item.description:
Fixed
  • Temporarily rolled back mixed language filename handling to address a crash
  • Fixed issues with indexing Recycle Bin folders
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.5.3 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Option to fetch metadata and artwork in the title’s original language
  • IPv6 support for SMB
  • Support for newer .eyetv files
  • Added detailed error messages for iCloud sync
  • Option to hide the Trailer button
  • Support for position tags in SRT subtitles
    • Improved
  • Improved support for mixed language file names
  • Improved handling of regional languages and dialects
  • Improvements for SMB streaming
  • Improved UI flow for deleting files
    • Fixed
  • Resolved issues with the Hide Spoilers option
  • Fixed confirmation prompt text when deleting local files
  • Fixed purchase prompt in dark mode
  • Fixed a crash when playing series folders
  • Resolved issues with deleting some local files
  • Resolved playback of some files without mastering metadata
  • Resolved issue with pausing when seeking with some HDR files
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.5.2 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Extended Parental Controls to cover trailers
  • Deleting local files now moves them to Recently Deleted
  • Added free in-app purchases for Dolby and DTS features
    • Improved
  • Improved support for HLG videos
  • Improved Trakt Pro sharing
    • Fixed
  • Resolved issues with black screen when playing some DoVi videos
  • Fixed HDR fallback for DoVi videos on older devices
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.5.1 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Enabled trailer audio with mute switch on
  • Added trailer option to series context menu in Up Next
    • Improved
  • Improved handling of DoVi videos shot on iPhone
  • Improved network error handling for trailers
  • Improvements for streaming from MEGA
    • Fixed
  • Fixed search results for cast/crew
  • Fixed opening trailers from a collection
  • Fixed video filtering in pinned Unwatched section
  • Fixed filtering of videos marked as Unwatched on media servers (Jellyfin, Emby, Plex)
  • Fixed cast sorting on pre-playback for Plex content
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.5 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Play video trailers for movies and TV shows
  • Group multiple copies of a movie together using ‘Smart Groups’
  • Recognize tags in filenames for cuts/parts
  • Choose metadata language when searching for movie/show titles
  • Save files directly from the Files app
    • Improved
  • Enhanced support for Dolby Vision (Profile 8) videos
  • Improved library search times
  • Improved handing of HDR/DoVi videos with invalid timestamps
  • Improved handling of yuv444p10le videos
  • Improved playback of some HEVC RExt videos
  • Many other internal player improvements
    • Fixed
  • Fixed cast and crew indexing
  • Fixed sorting of the ‘By Rating’ category on Home Screen
  • Fixed fetching of DoVi tags from Plex
  • Fixed importing of multiple files in a row from Files app
  • Fixed indexing status wrapping on Library screen
  • Fixes for playing RLE videos
  • Fixed crashes related to UPnP/DLNA when discovering shares
  • Fixes for some DVD (VobSub) subtitles
  • Fixed continuous playback setting for Collections
  • Fixed appearance of playback cache bar
  • Fixed crashes during metadata fetching
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.4.10 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Display HDR10+ tag on video details page
  • Option to add root share (All Files) to favorites
    • Improved
  • Speed & stability improvements for SMB streaming
  • Improved sorting of items on Home Screen
    • Fixed
  • Fixes for RTL subtitles
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.4.9 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • FTPS/FTPES support
  • Housekeeping for unused metadata in iCloud
  • Show files from local folders on the Synced tab
    • Improved
  • Improved IPv6 support
  • Improved updating of series watched status when new episodes are added
  • Improved punctuation mark positions in RTL subtitles
  • Improved switching to HDR for Dolby Vision (Profile 8)
  • UI improvements when setting up WebDAV/FTP network shares
    • Fixed
  • Fixed freezes when seeking VC-1 videos while buffering
  • Fixed iCloud sync when there are no favorites
  • Fixed stream detection in MPEG-TS
  • Fixed icon overlap in RTL locales
  • Fixed layout issues when using multi-select
  • Fixed home screen sorting by title
  • Fixed playlists editing for TV shows with a single episode
  • Fixed connection issues with Jellyfin 10.8.8
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.4.8 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Keep Trakt watched history after marking items as unwatched
    • Improved
  • Improved video duration detection during playback
  • Improved tracking and removal of unused metadata
  • Improved late interlacing detection for hardware decoded videos
  • Updated MEGA SDK libraries
  • Updated player icons
    • Fixed
  • Fixed Movie categorization during indexing
  • Fixed fallback to software decoder for certain videos
  • Fixed updating of watched status after reloading metadata
  • Fixed jittery playback of certain .m4v VC-1 videos
  • Fixed crashes during iCloud sync
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.4.7 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Display iCloud sync status on empty Home Screen
    • Improved
  • Improvements for iCloud sync
  • Improved housekeeping for stale/unused metadata and artwork
    • Fixed
  • Fixed switching of audio renderer when changing playback speed via hotkeys
  • Fixed visible white corners when long pressing on posters
  • Fixed playback of certain DVD files
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.4.6 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Enabled iCloud Sync while using cellular connections
    • Improved
  • Improved audio sync when using variable speed playback
  • Improved handling of Dolby Vision (Profile 5)
  • Improved brightness gestures on iOS 16
  • Improved video rendering performance
  • Improvements for NFS, WebDAV, FTP, and SFTP connections
  • Minor improvements for Google Drive
    • Fixed
  • Fixed overlap issue when switching to landscape
  • Fixed cropping of subtitles outside the video area
  • Fixed rate alert on external screen when mirroring
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.4.5 (iOS)
item.description:
Improved
  • Optimizations for iOS 16
  • Improved accuracy of iCloud Sync status
  • Improved handling of Blu-ray titles (BDMV)
  • Improved handling of disc images (ISO/IMG)
  • Improved ScaledBorderAndShadow flag handling in SSA/ASS subtitles
  • Improved Emby/Jellyfin collection visibility when indexing is disabled
  • Smoother zoom mode switching
    • Fixed
  • Fixed issues with failed iCloud Sync messages
  • Fixed alignment of description for RTL languages
  • Fixed handling of some Dolby Vision (Profile 5) videos
  • Fixed opening seasons from pinned collections
  • Fixed reordering in collections and playlists with more than 30 items
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.4.4 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Pin collections to Home Screen
  • Added support for ‘Credits’ NFO tag
  • Added keyboard shortcuts for app navigation
    • Improved
  • Improved brightness of HDR subtitles
  • Improved handling of complex subtitles
  • Improved support for SVG elements in subtitles
  • Improved performance of some animated subtitles
  • Improved error handling for Plex relay connections
    • Fixed
  • Fixed renaming of pinned playlists
  • Fixed character order for some RTL subtitles
  • Fixed stuck text with some subtitles
  • Fixed rare crashes when playing from cloud shares
  • Fixed ‘Mark As’ action for TV Show folders on UPnP shares
  • Fixed adding TV shows to playlists from search results
  • Fixed adding TV show folders into playlists
  • Fixed episode order when adding a TV show folder to a playlist
  • Fixed seasons removal from custom collections when deleting series
  • Fixed rare crashes when switching tabs
  • Other minor fixes and improvements

item.title: 7.4.3 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Mark an entire series or season as watched/unwatched

    • Improved
  • Improved confirmation popups when deleting custom collections
  • Improved appearance of collections when sorting by filenames
  • Improved loading progress for non-indexed TV Shows
  • Updated Library settings layout
    • Fixed
  • Fixed sorting of TV show collections
  • Fixed loading of custom collections
  • Fixed issue when deleting items in a collection
  • Fixed missing options to remove items from a playlist/collection
  • Fixed multi-select for TV shows in unindexed favorites
  • Fixed missing ‘Next Episode’ button
  • Fixed Plex and Emby series and seasons deletion
  • Fixed collections and playlists deletion for Plex, Emby, Jellyfin
  • Fixed alerts when deleting iTunes videos
  • Fixed deleting Emby collections
  • Fixed deletion alert for playlists on media shares
  • Fixed media share episode indexing after deleting
  • Fixed removal of related files for local videos
  • Fixed crashes during live preview generation
  • Fixed rare crashes during background indexing
  • Fixed context menu for TV show folders
  • Fixed playing from lock screen when ‘Every Play’ is On
  • Fixed item removal from custom collections when deleting files

item.title: 7.4.2 (iOS)
item.description:
New
  • Continuous playback between seasons

  • Added option to remove items from a collection/playlist in the contextual menu
  • Added filtering of synced episodes on details page
  • Returned ability to delete an entire TV show

  • Improved alerts when deleting TV show folders with related items

  • Fixed issues with synced videos in Picks of the Day list

  • Fixed thumbnails for empty seasons
  • Fixed visibility of unindexed items
  • Fixed opening TV show folders in unindexed favorites

item.description:
Fixed

item.title: 7.4 (iOS)

New

item.description:
Improved
  • Improved handling of Dolby Vision (Profile 5 and Profile 8)

item.title: 7.3.9 (iOS)
item.description:
Fixed

item.description:
New

item.description:
New
